title: Tales of the Greek Heroes
description: Walk amongst the gods and menThe beautiful land of Greece is haunted by more than three thousand years of legend and history. In this gripping retelling of the Heroic Age, you'll meet the mighty POSEIDON, God of the Sea; ZEUS, the King of Heaven and Earth; HADES, Lord of the Dead; ARTEMIS the Huntress; APHRODITE, Immortal Lady of Beauty and Love; and many more mortals and gods. Their adventures are some of the oldest and most famous stories in the world.Â Introduced with wit and humour by Rick Riordan, creator of the highly successful Percy Jackson series.
author: Roger Lancelyn Green
